public class AlbumDao
extends org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport

      • createAlbum

        public Album createAlbum(String name,
                Short year,
                Long artistId)
                  throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Creates a new album.
        Parameters:
        name - album name.
        year - album year.
        artistId - album artist identifier.
        Returns:
        the newly created album.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if album creation fails.

      • updateAlbum

        public void updateAlbum(Album album)
                 throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Updates the given album. Notice, that only name and year are updated.
        Parameters:
        album - album to update.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if the update fails.

      • findAlbumByArtistId

                                throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Finds albums by artist identifier.
        Parameters:
        artistId - artist identifier.
        Returns:
        list of found albums.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if finding albums fails.

      • findAlbumByNameLike

        public List<Album> findAlbumByNameLike(String name)
                                throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Finds albums by name, or part of name.
        Parameters:
        name - album name (or part of it).
        Returns:
        list of found albums.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if finding albums fails.
